author: Anonymous
title: The D Word: Will finally admitting she is angry help?
text: Divorce The D Word: Will finally admitting she is angry help? In the tenth weekly installment of our column about divorce, our anonymous writer realises they have both changed We’ve both changed!” I said, falling back on helpless cliché. Any minute I’d be saying “it’s not you, it’s me" Photo: Alamy (posed by models) By Anonymous
